name: Jessica's Bow Wow Bistro
summary: Jessica's looking to expand her cupcake shop by dishing up premium pet treats! Get her Bow-Wow Bistro booming by baking yummy delights for pets and their owners. Dazzle guests with decadent décor and a kitschy kitchen where culinary creations appease the palates of people and pets. Master your time management skills and fetch lots of cash to earn upgrades and expand your shops. Create a menu of healthy, tasty treats to achieve big rewards in this 'off-the-leash' time management game.
